entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 10:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: S 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming north 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Wind north 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
